author: Barry O'Kelly
title: Irish man questioned over international €15m virus scam
description: An Irish man is being questioned by gardaí as part of an international investigation into what is described as a sophisticated €15 million Covid-19 scam.
content:
An Irish man is being questioned by gardaí as part of an international investigation into what is described as a sophisticated €15 million Covid-19 scam.
The investigation was launched when German health authorities made an upfront payment online of €1.5 mil… [+3283 chars]
